        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var newPortfolioName = current.getValue("name");
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_portal_preferences");
	var join = gr.addJoinQuery("sys_portal_preferences", "portal_section", "portal_section");
	gr.addQuery("name", "renderer_id");
	gr.addQuery("value", "dcfa70110a0a0b86005f6a0aea423c89");
	join.addCondition("name","portfolio_id");
	join.addCondition("value", current.getUniqueValue());
	gr.query();
	
	while(gr.next()) {
		var portalSectionId = gr.getValue("portal_section");
		// Get the title record and update the record
		var titleRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_portal_preferences");
		titleRecord.addQuery("portal_section", portalSectionId);
		titleRecord.addQuery("name", "title");
		titleRecord.query();
		if(titleRecord.next()) {
			titleRecord.setValue("value", "Project Portfolio: "+ newPortfolioName);
			titleRecord.update();
		}
	}
	
})(current, previous);

]]></script>
